source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a scenic shot of a rugged coastline on a clear, sunny day. Large waves with white foam crash against dark, imposing rock formations in the turquoise ocean. A flock of birds can be seen flying in formation across the bright blue sky.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a scenic shot of a rugged coastline on a clear, sunny day. Large waves with white foam crash against dark, imposing rock formations in the turquoise ocean. A flock of birds can be seen flying in formation across the bright blue sky.

generated_critique: The caption correctly identifies the main subjects but lacks specificity in describing their motion, making it feel more like a description of a photograph than a video. The phrase "waves... crash" is too general; a more accurate description would detail the full, cyclical action, such as how the turquoise waves swell as they approach the shore, crest with white foam, and then break forcefully against the dark rocks, sending spray upwards before the water recedes. Similarly, "A flock of birds can be seen flying" is passive and lacks detail. It would be more informative to describe their specific trajectory, for instance, "a flock of birds flies in a V-formation from left to right across the upper portion of the frame." The caption also fails to mention any camera movement; if the shot includes a slow pan along the coastline, this essential motion should be described to accurately convey the viewing experience.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: The video captures a dynamic scene of a rugged coastline on a clear, sunny day. Turquoise waves swell as they approach the shore, cresting with white foam before breaking forcefully against the dark, imposing rock formations, sending spray upwards before the water recedes. A flock of birds flies in a V-formation from left to right across the upper portion of the bright blue sky. The camera slowly pans along the coastline, enhancing the viewer's experience of the expansive and vibrant seascape.
